backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing feed items, user profiles, media uploads, likes, and comments with access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated short descriptions of all frontend component files for quick reference.
frontend/deploy/dfx-frontend-canister-as: Configuration template showing how to correctly point the frontend canister to the Vite dist directory with validation steps.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide explaining required Vite production build workflow and correct frontend canister configuration.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind styles defining OKLCH theme variables, dark mode values, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA metadata, icons, and script loading the main React entry file.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, display settings, icons, and categories.
frontend/public/sw.js: Implements a service worker that caches static assets, cleans old caches, bypasses API traffic, and uses network-first or cache-first strategies with an offline fallback.
frontend/scripts/deploy-frontend-prod.sh: Builds the frontend, verifies the build and canister config, then deploys the frontend canister to the Internet Computer with post-deploy checks.
frontend/scripts/verify-dist-shell.ts: Validates the Vite dist output by checking index.html references and required static assets, failing if the build is incomplete or misconfigured.
frontend/scripts/verify-frontend-caniste: Checks dfx.json to ensure the frontend canister is an assets canister using the dist folder and with correct dependencies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication state, profile setup flow, service worker updates, and global PIN challenge interactions.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides login/logout UI tied to Internet Identity with status handling and cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a form for new authenticated users to save their profile name before entering the app.
frontend/src/components/capture/VideoCap: Provides camera access and recording controls for capturing a WebM video, handling permissions, errors, and returning the recorded file.
frontend/src/components/comments/Comment: A comment input form supporting text, image/video attachments, upload progress, and submission via a mutation.
Renders a list of comments with author info, text, and optional image or video attachments.
Bottom sheet that loads, displays, and updates comments for a feed item with a composer at the bottom.
frontend/src/components/editor/MediaEdit: Dialog for editing images or videos with filters, text, cropping, and trimming before returning an edited file.
frontend/src/components/feed/FeedItem.ts: Displays a feed item with media playback, like interactions, comments sheet, and share options, managing video state and user actions.
frontend/src/components/feed/FeedOverlay: Overlay showing handle and caption over media with optional child controls when active.
frontend/src/components/feed/Interaction: Renders like, comment, share, and download buttons with authentication checks and media download handling.
frontend/src/components/feed/SpeedContro: Provides a dropdown to change video playback speed using preset options.
frontend/src/components/feed/UploadButto: Shows an upload button that opens the upload dialog if the user is authenticated.
frontend/src/components/feed/UploadDialo: Handles media selection, capture, editing, and uploading with validation, progress tracking, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/feed/VideoFeed.t: Displays a scrollable feed of posts with intersection-based active item tracking and deep link navigation.
frontend/src/components/feed/VideoFeedIt: Placeholder file exporting nothing to avoid build errors.
frontend/src/components/feed/VideoOverla: Overlay controls for play/pause and mute toggling on videos.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchBut: Button that opens the search dialog.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDia: Search dialog that debounces input, fetches results, and displays matching feed items.
frontend/src/components/security/PinChal: PIN verification dialog with attempt tracking and success/failure handling.
frontend/src/components/security/Securit: Button that opens the security setup dialog.
Modal for creating a PIN and security questions, validating inputs and saving setup via useSecuritySetup.
Dialog offering link copy and native share options with visual feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeviceTrust.ts: Manages a persistent device ID in localStorage and tracks whether the device is trusted.
frontend/src/hooks/useDoubleTap.ts: Provides a ref that detects touch or mouse double‑tap events and triggers a callback.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider for Internet Identity login, identity persistence, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentityEx: Extended Internet Identity provider supporting external‑browser login flows and related state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React‑query hooks for feed loading, media upload, and like toggling with optimistic updates and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecuritySetup.ts: React hook managing PIN and security questions stored in localStorage with save and verify helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom color variables, layout resets, and mobile/PWA-safe utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/downloadMedia.ts: Downloads a media file via fetch, creates a blob URL, and triggers a hidden link download.
frontend/src/utils/embeddedBrowser.ts: Detects embedded/in-app browsers and checks support for external redirects.
frontend/src/utils/iiExternalReturn.ts: Manages external Internet Identity login state, nonce validation, callback detection, and URL cleanup.
frontend/src/utils/mediaEdits.ts: Applies basic image edits using canvas and returns the edited file; video edits are stubbed and return original.
frontend/src/utils/shareLinks.ts: Generates share URLs, provides clipboard and native share helpers, and checks share API support.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, removing, and persisting URL params across query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, radii, shadows, and keyframes with custom CSS variables.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config enabling React, env injection, path aliasing, build options, and API proxy setup.
project_state.json: Tracks project ZIZO’s state, describing the Android Internet Identity login workaround, known WebView limitations, existing features, and a pending feature request for external-browser authentication.
